ai-mil6.1.1:0.4_0: and being conquered by the Path of the Buddhas,
ai-mil6.1.1:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil6.1.1:1.2_0: They’re impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for two perfected ones, fully awakened Buddhas to arise in the same solar system at the same time.
ai-mil6.1.1:1.3_0: Remember the thirty-two marks of a Realized One. They train in the seven principles of the noble ones: they train in the teaching of the noble ones, and they train the four noble truths. And they train the teaching in diligence.
ai-mil6.1.1:1.4_0: If all the Nāgas were taught by the Realized One, all of them revealing the hidden by one, and three training, and one for two reasons?
ai-mil6.1.1:1.5_0: And the other world would be loyal to me.”
ai-mil6.1.1:2.1_0: “Great king, this galaxy would be worth ten thousand solar systems, foulness, and Buddha. That’s why he’d take care of the world.
ai-mil6.1.1:3.1_0: The caravan leader would be converted by a man in training a lady solid mass of contentment,
ai-mil6.1.1:3.2_0: Then along comes a second person—whether pleasant, middle, or junior—were all the same—what would they impale them, still wear?”
ai-mil6.1.1:3.3_0: “Sir, if you’d revere Campā he’d be caught up in the water, saying ‘May I prepare a poisonous, swept away the water!’
ai-mil6.1.1:3.4_0: “In the same way, great king, this galaxy would be worth ten thousand solar systems, foulness, and swords rugged in the world. And if he couldn’t take care of the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, wouldn’t be able to win the relics.
ai-mil6.1.1:4.1_0: Or suppose a person was to eat as much as they like, then fill the neck into it, put a shopkeeper on a stake as much as they like. Wouldn’t that person become full, then uninfected?”
ai-mil6.1.1:4.3_0: “In the same way, great king, this galaxy would be worth ten thousand solar systems.”
ai-mil6.1.1:5.1_0: “Sir, why does it not appear to you?”
ai-mil6.1.1:5.2_0: “Great king, if two carts were to take a treasure with a single-layered sole, then even if you loose a single cart, then in each of these two treasures would not accept it as much as you like.”
ai-mil6.1.1:5.3_0: “If anyone didn’t eat any fruit, their leader wouldn’t break into the fruit.”
ai-mil6.1.1:5.4_0: “Great king, what’s gem that you call a council with cart?”
ai-mil6.1.1:5.6_0: “In the same way, great king, that Dhamma speaks contrary to the Teaching as earth.
ai-mil6.1.1:6.1_0: Still, great king, this exposition of the Buddha’s explanation is devoted to the Island,
ai-mil6.1.1:6.2_0: they hear the same reason, even if they hear the same reason, no one at the end of the each one, the fully awakened Buddha—that is the wrong time.
ai-mil6.1.1:6.3_0: ‘If two warriors would arise in one gathering, just assembling the assembly will arise, the Buddha would have a strong man float on both sides, and we’ll accept our communities.’
ai-mil6.1.1:6.4_0: In the same way, if two disputes were to arise in the same way, all of them would answer: ‘May the Buddha become a Buddha!’
ai-mil6.1.1:6.5_0: This is the one reason, great king, that’s the reason why two reasons do the same thing.
ai-mil6.1.1:7.1_0: In addition, enveloping the reason for two reasons, when they hear the sound of the one Buddha, the fully awakened Buddha,
ai-mil6.1.1:7.2_0: If two experts, one is the awakened Buddha, the same: ‘The Buddha is the best of chief disciples, the highest of men, the eldest of Buddha, the highest among men, the blessed one, the highest of men, the awakened Buddha, or the highest among men.’
ai-mil6.1.1:7.3_0: You also have performed this reason for two reasons to make the following statements: “Great king, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha.”
ai-mil6.1.1:8.1_0: Rather, great king, the Buddhas awakened for themselves is one in the world, and so on.
ai-mil6.1.1:8.3_0: and benefited all the Buddhas of valuable qualities,
ai-mil6.1.1:8.4_0: That’s also, great king, that one is really one in the world.
ai-mil6.1.1:8.5_0: Through earth, great king, that is one,
ai-mil6.1.1:8.6_0: Sāgaradeva, the master of the sea,
ai-mil6.1.1:8.9_0: who is able to live alone, and likewise he
ai-mil6.1.1:8.10_0: Mātaliputta only one is like that.
ai-mil6.1.1:8.12_0: The Realised One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha in the world,
ai-mil6.1.1:8.13_0: Where there is no opportunity for me to be a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha.”
ai-mil6.1.1:9.1_0: “Sir, Sumedhā, how many ways has been answered by you by questioning me?
ai-mil6.1.1:9.2_0: You’ve heard it from there, how could there be such a great wisdom?
ai-mil6.1.1:9.3_0: It would be good, sir, if you would accept it.”
ai-mil6.1.1:10.1_0: After the two Buddhas arise, in the first enquiry,
